name: Flight Center
about: At Flight Center, we pride ourselves on providing personalized and excellence-driven flight training. With locations in New Jersey and Florida, we offer a diverse rental fleet, including single-engine, multi-engine, light sport, and tailwheel aircraft. Our programs include self-paced and accelerated training options, ensuring you reach your aviation goals efficiently. We maintain a transparent rate structure, inclusive of all charges, and offer financing options through partnerships with Stratus Financial and Flight Training Finance. Our experienced instructors provide real-world training, and we are committed to safety and excellence in every aspect of flight education. Whether you're pursuing a career in aviation or recreational flying, Flight Center is dedicated to helping you achieve your goals with flexible terms and a supportive environment. Join us for a seamless and successful flight training experience.
services:
["Private Pilot Course for Aircraft
Commercial Airplane Pilot Course
First Class Commercial Pilot Course

Restricted Radiotelephone Operator Course
ICAO English Course"]
